author: cstamas
msg: Adding debug (Lucene Explain) capability (for debugging purposes), and also fixed all the places where non-NexusIndexer/Searcher was used (that was preventing to centralize Similarity changes).

author: hwright
msg: Further improvement to a previously backported blame -g server-side
Very simple change that fixes another memory leak.
In the test case described in
svnserve's peak memory use from 574 MB to 71 MB.  r1041438 further

author: hwright
msg: Many subversion server administrators want it.

author: hwright
msg: The broken behavior is inconsistent with the way MIME mapping
files are used everywhere else in the world.
This merge will conflict due to changes in the path APIs.  Use
--accept=theirs-conflict to merge it, and then replace the one
introduced call to svn_dirent_local_style() with svn_path_local_style().
